Block.Text: {C1}The Pokémon can send nearby enemies to sleep.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can send nearby enemies to sleep for a long time.{End}
{C1}Reduces nearby enemies' Attack.{End}
{C1}Reduces nearby enemies' Speed.{End}
{C1}Reduces nearby enemies' accuracy.{End}
{C1}Increases nearby allies' Energy.{End}
{C1}Increases nearby allies' Defense.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon is able to collect more gold.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon is able to collect considerably more gold.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon explodes upon fainting, inflicting damage on those nearby.{End}
{C1}Appears disguised as an allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon has several different Abilities and can inflict damage upon Pokémon of all types.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon benefits from allied Warrior Skills, wherever they are.{End}
{C1}Enemies adjacent to the Pokémon cannot move.{End}
{C1}Enables a Pokémon to chop down trees with their attacks.{End}
{C1}Enables a Pokémon to smash rocks with their attacks.{End}
{C1}Increases Range when there are no other Pokémon within three squares.{End}
{C1}Increases Range.{End}
{C1}Forces hit enemies to switch places with adjacent enemies.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack when the Pokémon is above its target.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack when the Pokémon is below its target.{End}
{C1}Boosts the effectiveness of adjacent allies' Fire-type attacks.{End}
{C1}Boosts the effectiveness of adjacent allies' Water-type attacks.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack in proportion to distance moved.{End}
{C1}Improves stats every time the Pokémon defeats an enemy.{End}
{C1}Reduces Range of hit enemies.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can act as a decoy, attracting enemy attacks.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can act as a decoy, protecting allies from enemy moves.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can move freely through squares that contain allies.{End}
{C1}The Pokémon can restore a used Warrior Skill when their army is struggling.{End}
{C1}Improves stats when surrounded by enemies.{End}
{C1}Adjacent enemies can move only one square.{End}
{C1}The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all... {End}
{C1}The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc. {End}
{C1}A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body. {End}
{C1}The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.{End}
{C1}The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes two to five times in quick succession. {End}
{C1}The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.{End}
{C1}The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the Pokémon two to five times in a row. {End}
{C1}The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis. {End}
{C1}The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}The target is attacked with a slash of claws, etc. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.{End}
{C1}The user releases countless shots of light.{End}
{C1}The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.{End}
{C1}The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.{End}
{C1}The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. It may also leave the target with a burn.{End}
{C1}The user attacks the target with a bursting flame.{End}
{C1}The user slams its target with its flame-covered body.{End}
{C1}The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that hits them four to five times.{End}
{C1}The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.{End}
{C1}Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user's Attack.{End}
{C1}The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn. {End}
{C1}The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn. {End}
{C1}The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding an item, the item becomes burnt up and unusable.{End}
{C1}A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the target. It may also lower the target's Speed.{End}
{C1}The enemy is blasted with a forceful shot of water.{End}
{C1}A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. It may also lower the target's Speed.{End}
{C1}If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power. {End}
{C1}A pulse of water is ejected at the target, confusing them.{End}
{C1}The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.{End}
{C1}The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.{End}
{C1}Shock the target, with a potential to inflict paralysis.{End}
{C1}The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage. {End}
{C1}Charge the target while shrouded in electricity, with a potential to inflict paralysis. The user is weakened for 1 turn.{End}
{C1}A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis. {End}
{C1}A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis. {End}
{C1}After making its attack, the user will switch places with another Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Strike the target with an enormous lightning bolt. It may also cause paralysis.{End}
{C1}Charge the target while shrouded in electricity, with a potential to inflict paralysis. The user is weakened for 1 turn.{End}
{C1}The user charges at its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis. {End}
{C1}A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.{End}
{C1}The enemy is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.{End}
{C1}A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target. {End}
{C1}The target is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}A sharp-edged leaf is launched to slash at the target. It has a high critical-hit ratio. {End}
{C1}Petals are scattered two to three times to attack the target. The user is temporarily immobilized.{End}
{C1}A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The move's recoil lowers the user's Attack. {End}
{C1}Create a small blizzard that may also freeze the target.{End}
{C1}Blow an icy gale toward the target. May also reduce the target's Range.{End}
{C1}The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid. {End}
{C1}The user continually rolls into the target several times. It becomes stronger each time it hits. {End}
{C1}The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch. {End}
{C1}A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid. {End}
{C1}The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.{End}
{C1}The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis. {End}
{C1}This attack inflicts great damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however. {End}
{C1}The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead. {End}
{C1}The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit. {End}
{C1}The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.{End}
{C1}Attack with tremendous force. The user's Attack and Defense will decrease as a result. {End}
{C1}The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage. {End}
{C1}Sting the enemy with a poisoned needle. May poison the target.{End}
{C1}An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. This tail attack may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}The user bites the enemy with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned. {End}
{C1}A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also leave the target poisoned. Critical hits land more easily.{End}
{C1}Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.{End}
{C1}The user slaps dirt at the target, dealing damage and lowering the opponent's accuracy. {End}
{C1}The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed is reduced. {End}
{C1}The user throws a blob of mud at the target, which may lower accuracy. {End}
{C1}The attacker digs underground in the first turn then pops up in the next turn to attack.{End}
{C1}The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily. {End}
{C1}The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Defense.{End}
{C1}The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.{End}
{C1}The user takes the target into the sky then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky. {End}
{C1}The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user is weakened for 1 turn.{End}
{C1}The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused. {End}
{C1}Teleport to another square.{End}
{C1}Emit a beam of mysterious light in the enemy's direction. It may leave the target confused.{End}
{C1}The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep. {End}
{C1}The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP. {End}
{C1}The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage. {End}
{C1}The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio. {End}
{C1}The user launches a strong psychokinetic attack, lowering their enemy's Defense. {End}
{C1}A hunk of psychic energy attacks the target 2 turns after this move is used.{End}
{C1}The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage. {End}
{C1}The user bites the target. If the target is holding an item, the user eats it and gains its effect. {End}
{C1}The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.{End}
{C1}The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.{End}
{C1}The enemy is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.{End}
{C1}The target is attacked with rocks thrown forcefully two to five times in a row. {End}
{C1}Bombard the enemy with rocks. It may also reduce the target's Range.{End}
{C1}Send large rocks crashing into the enemy. It may also cause the target to flinch.{End}
{C1}The user stabs the target with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}The user launches a huge boulder at the enemy to attack. Cannot be used 2 turns in a row.{End}
{C1}Aggressively lick the enemy. It may also cause the target to flinch. {End}
{C1}The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch. {End}
{C1}This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.{End}
{C1}The user extends its shadow and attacks the enemy from behind.{End}
{C1}Attack the enemy with a ball of dark shadows, lowering the enemy's Defense. {End}
{C1}This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage. {End}
{C1}The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws. {End}
{C1}The user knocks away the target, causing it to be switched out for a different Pokémon.{End}
{C1}The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.{End}
{C1}The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}The user blasts the enemy with power that distorts even time. It cannot be used 2 turns in a row.{End}
{C1}The user rampages and attacks two to three times. The user is temporarily immobilized.{End}
{C1}The user approaches the target disarmingly then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail. {End}
{C1}If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.{End}
{C1}The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.{End}
{C1}The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage. {End}
{C1}Slash the target while its attention is diverted. It has a high critical-hit ratio.{End}
{C1}The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.{End}
{C1}The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target's accuracy.{End}
{C1}Scratch the enemy with steel claws. It may also increase the user's Attack.{End}
{C1}Strike the enemy with a hard head. It may also cause the target to flinch.{End}
{C1}Beat the enemy with a hardened tail. It may also lower the target's Attack.{End}
{C1}The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user's Attack. {End}
{C1}The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.{End}
{C1}The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. {End}
{C1}The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Defense.{End}
{C1}Unleash a powerful kick to knock the enemy off their feet.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack (for 3 turns). {End}
{C1}Raises Defense (for 3 turns). {End}
{C1}Significantly increases Range.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Restores HP of all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Significantly raises Attack.{End}
{C1}Raises Defense of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Improves accuracy (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}All moves are guaranteed to hit.{End}
{C1}Improves accuracy and increases chance of critical hits (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Enables Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places.{End}
{C1}Increases probability of inflicting status ailments on enemies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Makes enemies flinch (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range and makes enemies flinch.{End}
{C1}Restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Restores HP. Cannot move for 3 turns.{End}
{C1}Slowly restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Cures status ailments of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Cures any allied Pokémon who are poisoned or paralyzed.{End}
{C1}Cures any allied Pokémon who are confused or sleeping.{End}
{C1}Cures any allied Pokémon who are burned or frozen.{End}
{C1}Two treasure boxes will appear upon defeating an enemy. {End}
{C1}Significantly increases Range and Attack.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack and allows Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Allows Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Makes enemies flinch and allows Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Cures status ailments and restores HP for all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Two treasure boxes will appear upon defeating an enemy. Increases Energy (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Two treasure boxes will appear upon defeating an enemy. Increases Energy and Attack (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Improves accuracy and increases chance of critical hits for Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Increases Range and Attack for all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Blocks enemy critical hits and increases Speed for all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Speed and ensures all moves hit (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Raises Attack but lowers Defense of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Enables Warrior's Pokémon to avoid all enemy moves.{End}
{C1}Increases Attack and Defense of all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Attack and Range of all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies―at a cost...{End}
{C1}Blocks enemy critical hits and increases Energy for all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}Increases effectiveness of moves against Pokémon with male Warrior partners (for 3 turns). {End}
{C1}Increases Range, makes enemies flinch, and allows Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Dramatically improves Defense (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Blocks enemy critical hits and status ailments for all allied Pokémon (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Disables all enemy Warrior Skills.{End}
{C1}Increases Attack and Range of all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}All allies' moves will have a chance to confuse the enemy.{End}
{C1}Increases Range, allows Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places, and increases chance of critical hits (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Improves Speed, allows Warrior's Pokémon to climb to high places, and increases chance of critical hits (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases chance of critical hits and allows the Warrior's Pokémon to move twice.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack in proportion to the number of female Warriors on the battlefield.{End}
{C1}Raises Attack and restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Raises Defense and restores HP of Warrior's Pokémon and adjacent allies.{End}
{C1}Improves Speed and makes enemies flinch.{End}
{C1}Raises Energy and Attack of all allied Pokémon.{End}
{C1}All allies' moves will be successful (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Raises Attack and Defense (for 4 turns).{End}
{C1}Increases Range, and attacks will always be successful (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Raises Attack and makes enemies flinch (for 4 turns). {End}
{C1}Increases Speed, and attacks will always be successful (for 3 turns). {End}
{C1}Raises Defense and blocks status ailments (for 3 turns). {End}
{C1}Increases Range and Attack. Reduces HP to 1.{End}
{C1}Restores 20 HP. {End}
{C1}Restores 50 HP. {End}
{C1}Restores 200 HP. {End}
{C1}Fully restores HP.{End}
{C1}Restores HP and cures status ailments.{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing on grass (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing in water (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing in magma (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing in a poison bog (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing on rock (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Restores HP when standing on snow or ice (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Cures paralysis.{End}
{C1}Cures sleep.{End}
{C1}Cures poisoning.{End}
{C1}Cures burning.{End}
{C1}Cures freezing.{End}
{C1}Cures all status ailments. {End}
{C1}Prevents paralysis (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents sleep (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents poisoning (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents burning (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents freezing (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Prevents any status ailments (for 3 turns).{End}
{C1}Slightly increases Energy.{End}
{C1}Increases Energy. {End}
{C1}Significantly increases Energy. {End}
{C1}Increases Energy to maximum level. {End}
{C1}Slightly increases the probability of linking with Pokémon (for 3 turns). {End}
{C1}Increases the probability of linking with Pokémon (for 4 turns). {End}
{C1}Significantly increases the probability of linking with Pokémon (for 5 turns). {End}
{C1}Guarantees a critical hit on the next attack.{End}
{C1}Increases Range by one square (for 3 turns). {End}
